overview: It's hard for a young nineteen year old girl to learn that she's a lesbian, but it's even harder when you learn that you're attracted to your own stepmother. Penny Pax came into my life when my real mother left, and I accepted and loved Penny immediately. When my father divorced Penny, I was given the choice to stay with her or to come away with him. I chose her. I know I will always choose her. The problem is that Penny is a good woman, she knows it's wrong to be intimate with her own stepdaughter, even IF she had feelings for me. I don't know that she has feelings for me, and after years of heart wrenching lust for her, I decided to pursue another woman.. and that woman is my teacher, Mrs. Mona Wales.
title: Brianne's Journey
